architecture.common.event.internal
Class AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher

java.lang.Object
  architecture.common.event.internal.AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventDispatcher
public final class AsynchronousAbleEventDispatcher
extends Object
implements EventDispatcher

This dispatcher will dispatch event asynchronously if:

  • the event 'is' asynchronous, as resolved by the AsynchronousEventResolver and
  • the invoker supports asynchronous events

Since:
2.0
